Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to regulating the dissemination of personal information acquired by a provider of on-line computer services
Summary: Regulates the collection, disclosure and dissemination of personal information acquired by a provider of on-line computer services in order to ensure the privacy of subscriber information and wage patterns.
LawCode: Add ยง397-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the collection and disclosure of certain information collected by on-line computer services
